mapper.select: select num, subject from(select num, subject, row_number() over(order by w_date desc) r_num from diary) where r_num between 1 and 5
select num, writer, content, to_char(input_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') input_date from diary_reply where num_ref=#{num_ref} order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into diary_reply(num, num_ref, writer, content, input_date) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{num_ref}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate)
